attributes.action: Ask all MPs and cabinet ministers with a guilty conscience over expenses claims to make a donation of £5000 to troops in Afghanistan to buy proper  equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ask all MPs and cabinet ministers with a guilty conscience over expenses claims to make a donation of £5000 to troops in Afghanistan to buy proper  equipment

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
